this is our third time that i have stay in this resort fiesta americana condesa they pamper you a like royalty the services is exelent The staff will greet you from sun to dawn the cevecheria is one of the best near the pool I like to thanks Dzul xoc jorge Luis miguel angel perez sosa Jose antonio sanchez rodriguez in the pool area bar for the drinks
The best thing about Fiesta Americana Condesa was the outdoor pool and swim up bar along with the incredible activities staff that made the resort fun
All the eating and pool areas were kept spotless
The pool service was wonderful and the kids especially loved the smoothie bar pizza and hot dogs
this trip we at at the steakhouse and really enjoyed the food in there as well
We really enjoyed the nicer restaurants as we typically do n’t eat that fancy and it was nice to enjoy the variety of food
food and alcohol had a great selection
1: Every restaurant we tried was excellent and as stated above the staff was second to none
do not waste ur time booking the steakhouse not worth it
We saw him for lunch and dinner and had J for breakfast
lower pool with bar is more party and upbeat kidie pool with pirate ship serves its purpose
Though the lobby bar is makeshift due to ongoing renovations bartenders Felix and Carlos will ensure you have a fun time
Food at the buffet was okay I ’ve had better at other all inclusive hotels
Now some menu selections were better than others
This is a bummer given the fact that the main lobby bars are a great place to hang out during the evening between the pool bars closing and before and after dinner
We enjoyed our stay although the air conditioner does not work in the lobby restaurants gym or any other common areas

2: I have to special mention of our waiter at Kalmia restaurant JJ Juan Jose
We only ended up eating out for dinner once and that was to meet up with friends staying at another resort
It allowed us to dine whenever we were ready
The buffet could have a few more selections but overall was adequate
smaller places include a ice cream parlor cafe snack bar
also wish the staff had basic English in the inside bar area
I suggest the swim up bar and lobby bar after 8 pm
While there was not a dance club on site unlike other Fiesta Americanas I have been too this resort made going downtown to the clubs bar very easy
So if you call and request additional soda or beer you ’ve then exceeded your “ daily allotment ” and will be charged
of course the hotel will issue the temporary one time usable paper meal ticket but it is limited to the main buffet restaurant and you can not even get drinks or coffee from other bars and shops
